verses.verse: Jude <WG2455>, the servant <WG1401> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, and <WG1161> brother <WG80> of James <WG2385>, to them that are sanctified <WG37> by <WG1722> God <WG2316> the Father <WG3962>, and <WG2532> preserved <WG5083> in Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, and called <WG2822>:
Mercy <WG1656> unto you <WG5213>, and <WG2532> peace <WG1515>, and <WG2532> love <WG26>, be multiplied <WG4129>.

Beloved <WG27>, when I gave <WG4160> all <WG3956> diligence <WG4710> to write <WG1125> unto you <WG5213> of <WG4012> the common <WG2839> salvation <WG4991>, it was <WG2192> needful <WG318> for me <WG2192> to write <WG1125> unto you <WG5213>, and exhort <WG3870> you that ye should earnestly contend <WG1864> for the faith <WG4102> which was once <WG530> delivered <WG3860> unto the saints <WG40>.

For <WG1063> there are certain <WG5100> men <WG444> crept in unawares <WG3921>, who <WG3588> were before <WG4270> of old <WG3819> ordained <WG4270> to <WG1519> this <WG5124> condemnation <WG2917>, ungodly men <WG765>, turning <WG3346> the grace <WG5485> of our <WG2257> God <WG2316> into <WG1519> lasciviousness <WG766>, and <WG2532> denying <WG720> the only <WG3441> Lord <WG1203> God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>.

I will <WG1014> therefore <WG1161> put <WG5279> you <WG5209> in remembrance <WG5279>, though ye <WG5209> once <WG530> knew <WG1492> this <WG5124>, how that <WG3754> the Lord <WG2962>, having saved <WG4982> the people <WG2992> out of <WG1537> the land <WG1093> of Egypt <WG125>, afterward <WG1208> destroyed <WG622> them that believed <WG4100> not <WG3361>.

And <WG5037> the angels <WG32> which kept <WG5083> not <WG3361> their <WG1438> first estate <WG746>, but <WG235> left <WG620> their own <WG2398> habitation <WG3613>, he hath reserved <WG5083> in everlasting <WG126> chains <WG1199> under <WG5259> darkness <WG2217> unto <WG1519> the judgment <WG2920> of the great <WG3173> day <WG2250>.

Even as <WG5613> Sodom <WG4670> and <WG2532> Gomorrha <WG1116>, and <WG2532> the cities <WG4172> about <WG4012> them <WG846> in like <WG3664> <WG5125> manner <WG5158>, giving themselves over to fornication <WG1608>, and <WG2532> going <WG565> after <WG3694> strange <WG2087> flesh <WG4561>, are set forth for <WG4295> an example <WG1164>, suffering <WG5254> the vengeance <WG1349> of eternal <WG166> fire <WG4442>.

Likewise <WG3668> <WG3305> also <WG2532> these <WG3778> filthy dreamers <WG1797> defile <WG3392> the flesh <WG3303> <WG4561> <WG1161>, despise <WG114> dominion <WG2963>, and <WG1161> speak evil <WG987> of dignities <WG1391>.

Yet <WG1161> Michael <WG3413> the archangel <WG743>, when <WG3753> contending <WG1252> with the devil <WG1228> he disputed <WG1256> about <WG4012> the body <WG4983> of Moses <WG3475>, durst <WG5111> not <WG3756> bring against him <WG2018> a railing <WG988> accusation <WG2920>, but <WG235> said <WG2036>, The Lord <WG2962> rebuke <WG2008> thee <WG4671>.

But <WG1161> these <WG3778> speak evil <WG987> of those things which <WG3745> <WG3303> they know <WG1492> not <WG3756>: but <WG1161> what <WG3745> they know <WG1987> naturally <WG5447>, as <WG5613> brute <WG249> beasts <WG2226>, in <WG1722> those things <WG5125> they corrupt themselves <WG5351>.

Woe <WG3759> unto them <WG846>! for <WG3754> they have gone <WG4198> in the way <WG3598> of Cain <WG2535>, and <WG2532> ran greedily after <WG1632> the error <WG4106> of Balaam <WG903> for reward <WG3408>, and <WG2532> perished <WG622> in the gainsaying <WG485> of Core <WG2879>.

These <WG3778> are <WG1526> spots <WG4694> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> feasts of charity <WG26>, when they feast <WG4910> with you <WG5213>, feeding <WG4165> themselves <WG1438> without fear <WG870>: clouds <WG3507> they are without water <WG504>, carried about <WG4064> of <WG5259> winds <WG417>; trees <WG1186> whose fruit withereth <WG5352>, without fruit <WG175>, twice <WG1364> dead <WG599>, plucked up by the roots <WG1610>;

Raging <WG66> waves <WG2949> of the sea <WG2281>, foaming out <WG1890> their own <WG1438> shame <WG152>; wandering <WG4107> stars <WG792>, to whom <WG3739> is reserved <WG5083> the blackness <WG2217> of darkness <WG4655> for <WG1519> ever <WG165>.

And <WG1161> Enoch <WG1802> also <WG2532>, the seventh <WG1442> from <WG575> Adam <WG76>, prophesied <WG4395> of these <WG5125>, saying <WG3004>, Behold <WG2400>, the Lord <WG2962> cometh <WG2064> with <WG1722> ten thousands <WG3461> of his <WG846> saints <WG40>,

To execute <WG4160> judgment <WG2920> upon <WG2596> all <WG3956>, and <WG2532> to convince <WG1827> all <WG3956> that are ungodly <WG765> among them <WG846> of <WG4012> all <WG3956> their <WG846> ungodly <WG763> deeds <WG2041> which <WG3739> they have ungodly committed <WG764>, and <WG2532> of <WG4012> all <WG3956> their hard <WG4642> speeches which <WG3739> ungodly <WG765> sinners <WG268> have spoken <WG2980> against <WG2596> him <WG846>.

These <WG3778> are <WG1526> murmurers <WG1113>, complainers <WG3202>, walking <WG4198> after <WG2596> their own <WG846> lusts <WG1939>; and <WG2532> their <WG846> mouth <WG4750> speaketh <WG2980> great swelling <WG5246> words, having men's persons <WG4383> in admiration <WG2296> because <WG5484> of advantage <WG5622>.

But <WG1161>, beloved <WG27>, remember <WG3415> ye <WG5210> the words <WG4487> which <WG3588> were spoken before <WG4280> of <WG5259> the apostles <WG652> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>;

How <WG3754> that <WG3754> they told <WG3004> you <WG5213> there should be <WG2071> mockers <WG1703> in <WG1722> the last <WG2078> time <WG5550>, who should walk <WG4198> after <WG2596> their own <WG1438> ungodly <WG763> lusts <WG1939>.
These <WG3778> be <WG1526> they who separate <WG592> themselves <WG1438>, sensual <WG5591>, having <WG2192> not <WG3361> the Spirit <WG4151>.
But <WG1161> ye <WG5210>, beloved <WG27>, building up <WG2026> yourselves <WG1438> on your <WG5216> most holy <WG40> faith <WG4102>, praying <WG4336> in <WG1722> the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151>,

Keep <WG5083> yourselves <WG1438> in <WG1722> the love <WG26> of God <WG2316>, looking for <WG4327> the mercy <WG1656> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> unto <WG1519> eternal <WG166> life <WG2222>.
And <WG2532> <WG3303> of some <WG3739> have compassion <WG1653>, making a difference <WG1252>:

And <WG1161> others <WG3739> save <WG4982> with <WG1722> fear <WG5401>, pulling <WG726> them out of <WG1537> the fire <WG4442>; hating <WG3404> even <WG2532> the garment <WG5509> spotted <WG4695> by <WG575> the flesh <WG4561>.

Now <WG1161> unto him that is able <WG1410> to keep <WG5442> you <WG5209> <WG846> from falling <WG679>, and <WG2532> to present <WG2476> you faultless <WG299> before the presence <WG2714> of his <WG846> glory <WG1391> with <WG1722> exceeding joy <WG20>,

To the only <WG3441> wise <WG4680> God <WG2316> our <WG2257> Saviour <WG4990>, be glory <WG1391> and <WG2532> majesty <WG3172>, dominion <WG2904> and <WG2532> power <WG1849>, both <WG2532> now <WG3568> and <WG2532> ever <WG1519> <WG3956> <WG165>. Amen <WG281>.
